# INInteractionDirection.outgoing

**Case**

An interaction in which information is sent from the device.

## Declaration

```swift
case outgoing
```

## Discussion

Choose this value when the interaction involves the user starting a video call from the current device.

## Constants

- **INInteractionDirection.unspecified**: An unspecified direction.
- **INInteractionDirection.incoming**: An interaction in which information is received on the device.

items.description: An interaction in which information is received on the device.
